sqlMap.select:
select mallGoods.GOODS_ID as mallGoods_GOODS_ID, mallGoods.ID as mallGoods_ID, mallGoods.GOODS_TITLE as mallGoods_GOODS_TITLE, mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS as mallGoods_GOODS_CLASS, mallGoods.PROMOTION_PRICE as mallGoods_PROMOTION_PRICE, mallGoods.GOODS_PRICE as mallGoods_GOODS_PRICE, mallGoods.GOODS_IMAGES as mallGoods_GOODS_IMAGES, mallGoods.APPS_PRICE as mallGoods_APPS_PRICE, mallGoods.LOGISTICS_WEIGTH as mallGoods_LOGISTICS_WEIGTH, mallGoods.GOODS_LOCATION as mallGoods_GOODS_LOCATION, mallGoods.GOODS_BARCODE as mallGoods_GOODS_BARCODE, mallGoods.CREATE_TIME as mallGoods_CREATE_TIME, mallGoods.IS_PUTAWAY as mallGoods_IS_PUTAWAY, mallGoods.GOODS_DESC as mallGoods_GOODS_DESC, mallGoods.APPS_DES as mallGoods_APPS_DES ,mallGoodsInfo.STORE_NUM AS mallGoodsInfo_STORE_NUM,mallGoodsInfo.ID AS mallGoodsInfo_INFO_ID, mallGoodsInfo.UPLOAD_STATUS as mallGoodsInfo_UPLOAD_STATUS, mallGoodsInfo.GOODS_STATUS as mallGoodsInfo_GOODS_STATUS, mallGoodsInfo.ATTRIBUTE_NAME as mallGoodsInfo_ATTRIBUTE_NAME,mallGoodsInfo.IS_SUB_GOODS as mallGoodsInfo_IS_SUB_GOODS,mallGoodsInfo.MERCHANT_NUM as mallGoodsInfo_MERCHANT_NUM, mallGoodsInfo.ACTIVITY_ID as mallGoodsInfo_ACTIVITY_ID,mallGoodsInfo.AUDIT_STATUS as mallGoodsInfo_AUDIT_STATUS, mallGoodsInfo.UNPASS_REASON as mallGoodsInfo_UNPASS_REASON, mallGoodsInfo.AD_ID as mallGoodsInfo_AD_ID,mallGoodsInfo.CLASS_FEATURE as mallGoodsInfo_CLASS_FEATURE,mallGoodsInfo.CLASS_ATTRIBUTE as mallGoodsInfo_CLASS_ATTRIBUTE,mallGoodsInfo.PACKING_LIST as mallGoodsInfo_PACKING_LIST from t_mall_goods mallGoods,t_mall_goods_info mallGoodsInfo where mallGoods.GOODS_ID=mallGoodsInfo.GOODS_ID
order by $orderByClause$

sqlMap.delete: delete from t_mall_goods where GOODS_ID = #goodsId:VARCHAR# and ID = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_mall_goods (GOODS_ID, ID, GOODS_TITLE, GOODS_CLASS, PROMOTION_PRICE, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_IMAGES, APPS_PRICE, LOGISTICS_WEIGTH, GOODS_LOCATION, GOODS_BARCODE, CREATE_TIME, IS_PUTAWAY, GOODS_DESC, APPS_DES) values (#goodsId:VARCHAR#, #id:BIGINT#, #goodsTitle:VARCHAR#, #goodsClass:VARCHAR#, #promotionPrice:VARCHAR#, #goodsPrice:VARCHAR#, #goodsImages:VARCHAR#, #appsPrice:VARCHAR#, #logisticsWeigth:VARCHAR#, #goodsLocation:VARCHAR#, #goodsBarcode:VARCHAR#, #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, #isPutaway:VARCHAR#, #goodsDesc:LONGVARBINARY#, #appsDes:LONGVARBINARY#)

select count(*) from t_mall_goods mallGoods , t_mall_goods_info mallGoodsInfo where mallGoods.GOODS_ID=mallGoodsInfo.GOODS_ID
order by $orderByClause$

select mallGoods.GOODS_ID as mallGoods_GOODS_ID, mallGoods.ID as mallGoods_ID, mallGoods.GOODS_TITLE as mallGoods_GOODS_TITLE, mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS as mallGoods_GOODS_CLASS, mallGoods.PROMOTION_PRICE as mallGoods_PROMOTION_PRICE, mallGoods.GOODS_PRICE as mallGoods_GOODS_PRICE, mallGoods.GOODS_IMAGES as mallGoods_GOODS_IMAGES, mallGoods.APPS_PRICE as mallGoods_APPS_PRICE, mallGoods.LOGISTICS_WEIGTH as mallGoods_LOGISTICS_WEIGTH, mallGoods.GOODS_LOCATION as mallGoods_GOODS_LOCATION, mallGoods.GOODS_BARCODE as mallGoods_GOODS_BARCODE, mallGoods.CREATE_TIME as mallGoods_CREATE_TIME, mallGoods.IS_PUTAWAY as mallGoods_IS_PUTAWAY from t_mall_goods mallGoods where mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS = #goodsClass# or mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS in (select id from t_mall_goods_class where PARENT_ID = #goodsClass#) or mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS in (select id from t_mall_goods_class where PARENT_ID in (SELECT id from t_mall_goods_class where PARENT_ID = #goodsClass#)) or mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS in (select id from t_mall_goods_class where parent_id in (select id from t_mall_goods_class where PARENT_ID IN (select id from t_mall_goods_class where PARENT_ID = #goodsClass#)) ) or mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS in (select id from t_mall_goods_class where parent_id in (select id from t_mall_goods_class where PARENT_ID IN (select id from t_mall_goods_class where PARENT_ID IN (select id from t_mall_goods_class where PARENT_ID = #goodsClass#))));
sqlMap.update:
update t_mall_goods mallGoods
mallGoods.GOODS_ID = #record.goodsId:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.ID = #record.id:BIGINT#
mallGoods.GOODS_TITLE = #record.goodsTitle:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS = #record.goodsClass:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.PROMOTION_PRICE = #record.promotionPrice:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.GOODS_PRICE = #record.goodsPrice:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.GOODS_IMAGES = #record.goodsImages:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.APPS_PRICE = #record.appsPrice:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.LOGISTICS_WEIGTH = #record.logisticsWeigth:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.GOODS_LOCATION = #record.goodsLocation:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.GOODS_BARCODE = #record.goodsBarcode:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:TIMESTAMP#
mallGoods.IS_PUTAWAY = #record.isPutaway:VARCHAR#
mallGoods.GOODS_DESC = #record.goodsDesc:LONGVARBINARY#
mallGoods.APPS_DES = #record.appsDes:LONGVARBINARY#

update t_mall_goods mallGoods set mallGoods.GOODS_ID = #record.goodsId:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.ID = #record.id:BIGINT#, mallGoods.GOODS_TITLE = #record.goodsTitle:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS = #record.goodsClass:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.PROMOTION_PRICE = #record.promotionPrice:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_PRICE = #record.goodsPrice:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_IMAGES = #record.goodsImages:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.APPS_PRICE = #record.appsPrice:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.LOGISTICS_WEIGTH = #record.logisticsWeigth:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_LOCATION = #record.goodsLocation:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_BARCODE = #record.goodsBarcode:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:TIMESTAMP#, mallGoods.IS_PUTAWAY = #record.isPutaway:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_DESC = #record.goodsDesc:LONGVARBINARY#, mallGoods.APPS_DES = #record.appsDes:LONGVARBINARY#

update t_mall_goods mallGoods set mallGoods.GOODS_ID = #record.goodsId:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.ID = #record.id:BIGINT#, mallGoods.GOODS_TITLE = #record.goodsTitle:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_CLASS = #record.goodsClass:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.PROMOTION_PRICE = #record.promotionPrice:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_PRICE = #record.goodsPrice:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_IMAGES = #record.goodsImages:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.APPS_PRICE = #record.appsPrice:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.LOGISTICS_WEIGTH = #record.logisticsWeigth:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_LOCATION = #record.goodsLocation:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.GOODS_BARCODE = #record.goodsBarcode:VARCHAR#, mallGoods.CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:TIMESTAMP#, mallGoods.IS_PUTAWAY = #record.isPutaway:VARCHAR#

update t_mall_goods
GOODS_TITLE = #goodsTitle:VARCHAR#
GOODS_CLASS = #goodsClass:VARCHAR#
PROMOTION_PRICE = #promotionPrice:VARCHAR#
GOODS_PRICE = #goodsPrice:VARCHAR#
GOODS_IMAGES = #goodsImages:VARCHAR#
APPS_PRICE = #appsPrice:VARCHAR#
LOGISTICS_WEIGTH = #logisticsWeigth:VARCHAR#
GOODS_LOCATION = #goodsLocation:VARCHAR#
GOODS_BARCODE = #goodsBarcode:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#
IS_PUTAWAY = #isPutaway:VARCHAR#
GOODS_DESC = #goodsDesc:LONGVARBINARY#
APPS_DES = #appsDes:LONGVARBINARY#
where GOODS_ID = #goodsId:VARCHAR# and ID = #id:BIGINT#

update t_mall_goods set GOODS_TITLE = #goodsTitle:VARCHAR#, GOODS_CLASS = #goodsClass:VARCHAR#, PROMOTION_PRICE = #promotionPrice:VARCHAR#, GOODS_PRICE = #goodsPrice:VARCHAR#, GOODS_IMAGES = #goodsImages:VARCHAR#, APPS_PRICE = #appsPrice:VARCHAR#, LOGISTICS_WEIGTH = #logisticsWeigth:VARCHAR#, GOODS_LOCATION = #goodsLocation:VARCHAR#, GOODS_BARCODE = #goodsBarcode:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, IS_PUTAWAY = #isPutaway:VARCHAR#, GOODS_DESC = #goodsDesc:LONGVARBINARY#, APPS_DES = #appsDes:LONGVARBINARY# where GOODS_ID = #goodsId:VARCHAR# and ID = #id:BIGINT#
